content: Hi all! I started using Rust two years ago and fell in love with it. I went to Rustconf this year and had a great time. I've been writing some pages for Rust By Example and wanted to take a shot at contributing to the compiler too :)
I work at the same company as Steve and Ashley Williams (different team though), and I've never worked on a compiler before. But I've written parsers in Rust/Haskell before.
see conversation with @Amanjeev Sethi here https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/212497-t-compiler.2Fhelp-wanted/topic/Aman
that may give you some pointers, feel free to ask things around
